title: What to carry in AT?
content: Can we carry power banks? Cosmetics?

comments.body:
power banks mostly not allowed

cosmetics definitely not allowed, i know this because last year my friend had her lipstick confiscated and never got it back
Nah don't take risk by carrying powerbanks. These so called mfs oc, once they take away your stuff they don't return it.
not sure, but you won’t be allowed to carry a bag, so even if it’s permitted you’ll have to deal with the hassle of holding it in your hands the entire time
Well its eithrr that or get sick before isa
They want you to buy stuff there, so yeah
